trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_SEQ_00<tab>This elderly private needs help finding someone.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the soldiers at Castrum Oriens.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the serpent recruit.

TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_ELDERLYPRIVATE02869_000_000<tab>Sorry to bother you, but would you mind helping me look for my daughter? She headed off in the direction of Castrum Oriens quite a while ago and should've been back by now.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_ELDERLYPRIVATE02869_000_001<tab>Would you mind asking the Alliance soldiers there if they've seen her?
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_ELDERLYPRIVATE02869_000_002<tab>She has blonde hair and brown eyes. Last I heard she had been dispatched to fight at Baelsar's Wall. Please, bring her back to me!
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_ELDERLYPRIVATE02869_000_003<tab>She has blonde hair and brown eyes. Last I heard she had been dispatched to fight at Baelsar's Wall. Please, bring her back to me!

TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! To what do we owe the pleasure?

TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_011<tab>Hmm, I cannot say anyone here matches that description. That said, I do faintly recall hearing of a gentleman searching for such a lady in the past.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_012<tab>It may be worth your while asking some of my subordinates if they know aught.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_KAKALAI_000_013<tab>A blonde female soldier? Sorry, no one comes to mind.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_LOEZKIRZ_000_014<tab>I've seen a Miqo'te that matches that description, but no Hyurs.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_PIP_000_015<tab>Cannot say I have seen anyone like that around here. You may have better luck asking a member of the Order of the Twin Adder. This is their post after all.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_016<tab>It may be worth your while asking some of my subordinates if they know aught.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_KAKALAI_000_017<tab>A blonde female soldier? Sorry, no one comes to mind.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_LOEZKIRZ_000_018<tab>I've seen a Miqo'te that matches that description, but no Hyurs.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_PIP_000_019<tab>Cannot say I have seen anyone like that around here. You may have better luck asking a member of the Order of the Twin Adder. This is their post after all.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869_000_030<tab>Wait, did you just say you were asked to search for this woman by an elderly private?
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869_000_031<tab>Losing a loved one is never easy, but it really is about time he accepted reality. His daughter has been dead for a while now.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869_000_032<tab>She was seduced by the Griffin's words and joined his forces in the battle at Baelsar's Wall. It was there she breathed her last.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869_000_033<tab>We confirmed as much when we showed her belongings to her father.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869_000_034<tab>However, it seems the shock was too much for him. He has repeatedly visited us since, requesting every time that we look for his daughter.
TEXT_STMBDZ913_02869_TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869_000_035<tab>I will speak with him once more and make sure this does not happen again. My apologies for him sending you on a wild goose chase.
